definition: a public display of group feelings (usually of a political nature)
details:
noun
- a public display of group feelings (usually of a political nature)
= synonyms: demonstration
- a manifest indication of the existence or presence or nature of some person or thing
= example: a manifest indication of the existence or presence or nature of some person or thing
- expression without words
= synonyms: expression
- an appearance in bodily form (as of a disembodied spirit)
= synonyms: materialization, materialisation
- a clear appearance
= example: a clear appearance
